channel.title: Markdown on John Houghton

item.title: How to Make Awesome R Markdown for Blogdown
item.description: knitr::read_chunk('~/Documents/Github/r_snippets/blogdown.R') R Notebook Options blogdown documentation here: https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/html-document.html Knitr Examples on Github https://github.com/yihui/knitr-examples ## CheatSheet https://www.ethz.ch/content/dam/ethz/special-interest/math/statistics/sfs/Education/Advanced%20Studies%20in%20Applied%20Statistics/course-material-1719/Datenanalyse/rmarkdown-2.pdf Markdown Themes rmdformats package https://github.com/juba/rmdformats The github README.md provides some good examples Hereâ€™s a great collection of examples of themes http://www.datadreaming.org/post/r-markdown-theme-gallery/ Custom Build Functions https://yutani.rbind.io/post/2017-10-25-blogdown-custom/
